Hour long shows without commercials ~ 400-500MB

Ok I get it. My only question was that an upload from ettv from tonight (Revenge S02E11 HDTV XviD-AFG[ettv]) for example, is 350mb for about 45 minutes of video. By that math, a 60 minute rip would only be about 460-470mb. It's not a big deal, I was just wondering. Not complaining about quality as I know ettv is the best and quickest.
agreed, it is very large for a 50 minute HDTV tv show

Why is better quality an issue? I don't understand the problem. I guess if you're watching this on a laptop, resolution wouldn't matter. If you use a flatscreen TV, however, you're cheating yourself by not downloading the hi-res version. Get more storage.. its not that expensive.
Thanks for all you work and effort on this show and the hundreds of other episodes of other shows I have dl from you. Ignore the haters, and keep up the good work please.
